original: intros. intros Hlimx Hlimy P HP. intros eps. unfold is_filter_lim in *. specialize (Hlimx (fun x => ball x eps y)). specialize (Hlimy (fun x => ball x eps x)). apply (filter_imp _ F) with (P := fun x => ball x eps y) in Hlimx. apply (filter_imp _ F) with (P := fun x => ball x eps x) in Hlimy. apply (filter_and _ F) in Hlimx. apply (filter_and _ F) in Hlimy. apply (close_trans _ y) with (y0 := x). - eapply Hlimx; auto. - apply (close_sym _ y x). eapply Hlimy; auto.
